var brandColors = Object.keys(_brandColors).map(function(key){
  return {name: key, color: _brandColors[key]}
});

function getAll() {
  return brandColors;
}

function find(name) {
  return brandColors.filter(function(brand){
    return brand.name === name;
  });
}

exports.getAll = getAll;
exports.find = find;
